name: Men in Black: The Series 2
description:
Evil aliens, agent clones and monstrous bosses; just another day in the life of the MIBs. This sequel to the 1998 platform game, based on the 1997 film and subsequent cartoon series, pits the player, as either veteran agent K or his rookie partner J, against a horde of alien monsters threatening New York City and, by extension, the Earth.

The player's mission will take him or her through eight different levels, ranging from a hijacked aircraft, the forest, a laboratory, MIB headquarters, an MIB safehouse, a rocket silo, Manhattan and even the Statue of Liberty. In each level, the player has to collect four pairs of MIB sunglasses before moving on.

The arsenal of weaponry ranges from your standard-issue J2 blaster, rocket launchers and grenade launchers to freeze rays, homing missiles and the almighty Noisy Cricket. There are various items as well, including chemical protection suits, snowshoes, invisibility suits, and smart cards to gain access to new areas. Health packs and 1-ups are also scattered around.

With this much at your disposal, the scum of the universe doesn't stand a chance.

shot.caption: "Men in Black" squared? What the...?
Pick your language. unfortunately, this was rushed out so Klingon and Thermian were not able to be implemented.
Options, options, who's got the options?
Choose between the star of "Fresh Prince" and the star of "Man of the House."
They couldn't come up with a more compelling mission? Was Zed taking a leak at that moment?
Your first mission.
You start here.
Wait, are we collecting parts of the glasses or the glasses themselves?
Evil agent clones = Will Smith after extensive skin bleaching.
Jumping to avoid a shot.
It's the Brain From Planet Arous! Call John Agar!
Rather strange luggage
An alien as deigned by a six-year old.
Ah, HERE's the aircraft.
Taking on an alien in the cargo hold.
These symbols give you bonus points.
A knight and a grasshopper were spliced together today...
The first boss. Just wail on him until he's through.
Grab the Neuralyzer to exit the level.
"If you could just look into the little red light, please..."
Passcode and total score.
Second mission .
Wow, MIB's redecorated.
And this is why you don't buy your security system from Dollar General.
"Theorizing that one could time travel within his own lifetime, actor Will Smith stepped into the Quantum Leap Accelerator... and vanished."
More faulty cannons.
Attack of the fry kids!
Game over, man, GAME OVER!
